Description: About Dubai Foundation for Women and Children:   The Dubai Foundation for Women and Children is the first authorized non-profit shelter and humanitarian care in the United Arab Emirates to care for women and children who are victims of domestic violence, child abuse, and victims of human trafficking. It was established in late 2007 in order to provide victims with immediate shelter, protection and support services, in accordance with international human rights conventions.Accountable for the administration and management for the organizational procurement activities. The position responsibilities include coordinating with all departments to solicit needs, source or solicit suppliers, develop evaluation criteria, and bids in accordance with the organizational policies and procedures and operations strategy.Bachelor’s degree from an accredited university in (supply chain, management, or procurement).Job Details
